answers.answer: Often when seeing the doctor our BP rises due to being nervous, keep a check on it and if it stays up, then you need to address it.  If your doctor didn't do any tests like an xray, I would want this done.  It's not related to high BP, diabetes, or heart disease.  It may have been there since birth, and is extra cartilage, but I would want an xray to verify this.Take care...

The cartilage build up could be a whole variety of things including Solitary Osteochondroma.....http://medind.nic.in/ibn/t06/i3/ibnt06i3p339.pdfYou need to see an expert and have an x-ray and possibly a ct scan to see the problem.Anything else would be guessing.

Thank you both for responding , i did get a ct scan , i think he did abdominal scan too see if i had kidney stones, or cysts on my ovaries  which he said the only thing he saw was a 2 cm cyst on my right ovary which ive had that cyst for yrs and it was 1cm when i first found out about it .when i went to my doc last wk i told him about the lump ,so he felt it , and he asked me if i was doing any crunches or anything i said no i dont really do any exercises , he said feels like  cartilage buildup , so he did some snap crackle , pop on my back to see if that was the problem , and pushed my lower ribs back into place, but it didnt help , he prescribed me flexeril , it doesnt even touch it , it made the soreness that he did go away but i still feel the pain and tenderness coming from that lump in the front ,side and back basically between the hip and lower base of the ribs !I told him about my mom having diabetes and both her parents having it , and if i should be tested often to make sure , he said yes and after that he slipped in can i test u for high cholesteral , i said sure  why not. so he left the room with my chart and was on the phone with a cardioligst so he stopped me before i went for my blood work and asked do u mind if i prescribe you flexaril , and i said sure why not.Anyways the reason for ct scan was because i am having alot of UTI'S  inthe last 10 yrs , and there was blood in my urine ,and i told him about the pains on my left side ,so he wanted to see if i had any stones or cysts maybe causing it , but he found nothing ! except the 2cm cyst on my right ovary  which he said wouldnt cause all the pain on the left side !All i know this is getting annoying ,when i sit i feel like i have a ball of some sort on my ribs ,when i cough my side and back hurts , or if i turn i cant turn all the way . i just dont get it if this is some sort of cartilige build up then why does it hurt , why do i have soreness between my hip and waist line , and i also sometimes get the feeling like stitches inside like that prickly pain feeling !i know i can go on and on about this and get no where with it !again thank you all for responding !

question: hello , i dont know where else to post this accept here , i went to the doc friday and i have this lump on my left side of the bottem base of my ribcage , he said its cartlige build up , what does that mean ? he also tested me for high cholestral . is that a sign of possibley having high choletral ? my blood pressure was also slighty elevated too  i think it was 136/88 normially its like 117/ 70 or something like that its always been under 120 / 80  i know my parents have high cholestral and they are on lipator , they also have high blood pressure , my dad has heart disease , and my mother has diabetes . both my mothers parents had diabetes, and heart disease run on my dads side of the family ! anyways i thank you for your response again im just looking to see what this cartlige build up means . its a lump on the left side of my ribcage at the bottom base of it !
title: what does this mean ?
